DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the efficacy and safety of rostaporfin (PHOTREX) photodynamic therapy (PDT) in the treatment of classic and occult subfoveal choroidal neovascularization (CNV) associated with age-related macular degeneration (AMD).
DOC.brief_title: Double-Masked Study of Photrex (Rostaporfin) Photodynamic Therapy in the Treatment of Age-Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Patients with age greater than or equal to 50 years with at least one subfoveal CNV membrane secondary to AMD that can be demonstrated by fluorescein angiography.
